post.body: FB is wrong.
you asked: "Don't ppl they're with notice?" and that is what I was replying to! :)
me too!
not if they're talking on their own phone!
Hope everything goes well for her! I made some good cash babysitting as a teenager.
How old is she?
I'd gladly give you some of our snow.
I chimed in! Hope it helps.
thanks!
the pic I'm using on FB is also here http://is.gd/cw7G
In 1999, he also recanted his previous statement that co-sleeping was wrong and admitted it works for some families.
He said it might not be right for all kids basically and other techniques could be used too. That was in 2005.
that's why I use tweetdeck for one and twitterfox/web for the other
I think it is just a personality thing. Mine were both breastfed, but DD is more cuddly than DS.
It is included in the link that I provided
We are in Canada and caucasian and I chose not to supplement because we get plenty of sunlight
I encourage understanding your baby's risk factors re vitamin D. I don't suggest any other supplements. http://is.gd/eqTr
always glad to share!
I noticed that you RT your DMs. @GretaBlau does too and wants to turn it off. Do you know how?
Keep this link handy - great info on taking meds while breastfeeding http://is.gd/eqO3
@BeyondPrenatals maybe I'll write a post called "The Normal Course of Breastfeeding" :)
A few that I wrote about http://is.gd/eqMc and http://is.gd/eqMe
short with option to click somewhere for more detail
I often hope that big brother is watching and waking up!!! (I like to rant about what organizations are doing wrong)
- RT @TweetDeck: can you get her to email me with whats going on, preferably with a screenshot - hello at tweetdeck dot com
put in link:http://yourblogname into the search like this: http://is.gd/epGj
for example, here is a list of my incoming links on Google Blog Search http://is.gd/epG3
you can also use google blog search or technorati to see incoming links
Trying to get caught up on following back.
Other than obvious spam, today I got the first comment on my blog that I refused to approve.
Getting big sloppy kisses from my 21 mo old.
Got an ice cream headache from the cold wind today.
Going out to brave the storm...
Is Mirena following in Motrin's footsteps? What is your reaction to this co-sleeping image in IUD ad? http://is.gd/crRE
Updated my facebook profile pic to one of me breastfeeding with my breast showing.
Price difference between Intel® Core™ 2 Duo T5870 & Intel® Core™ 2 Duo T9500 is huge ($600). Is it worth it? What difference does it make?
Buying new laptop. Do mostly MS office/social media stuff. Should I get Intel® Core™ 2 Duo T5870 or Intel® Core™ 2 Duo T9500? Speed?
"Hey facebook, Breastfeeding is not obscene" group membership climbed by another 15,111 since yesterday! Now at 115,111
keep finding more receipts. Good because I pay less taxes, bad because now I have to process them.
turning off tweetdeck for a while....need to focus
